sub_title: Business Development @ Audion 🚀 | Packaging Equipment 🌎 | Healthcare & Lifescience 💊
summary:
🌎 Introduction: born in Norway, lived/worked/studied in countries such as Israel, Jordan, Canada, Austria, Bulgaria, Finland and the Netherlands. I am a responsible, organized, hard-working, proactive and highly motivated professional. Challenges lover and developing a position of responsibility in the company, I see my job as another adventure: an activity in which every day you learn new things and experiences, lessons and anecdotes that help you live better. Always ready to travel, I like being part of the expansion and growth projects of enterprises, assuming new responsibilities on an international scope.

🏆 Professional Summary:
Seasoned executive experienced in all aspects of strategic planning, operations, marketing, new product, new business platform and new global market development, social media and communications in pharmaceutical/medical products and B2B channels.

My career successes center around my ability to work across cultural and political boundaries, think creatively, innovate ideas, test their viability and get them to market quickly. My experiences have taught me life lessons about listening to customers, building relationships, responding fast to demands and making a profit for my team. I love the challenge of developing new businesses, working with talented people across many cultures in a positive, rewarding and upbeat cultural setting in a variety of geographical locations.

✔ Specialties: Information Technology, Serialization and Track&Trace, Traceability, Packaging Machines, Packaging Software, Software as a Service, Software Development, Hardware Development, Outsourcing

▶ Industries: Life Science, Healthcare, Pharmaceutical, Medical

profile_positions.description:
Audion Packaging Machines is a manufacturing company providing complete packaging solutions for the pharmaceutical/medical industry. The product range consists of the following packaging equipment: manual and semi-automatic sealers, industrial vacuum sealers, shrink machines, vacuum chambers, tray packers, form fill and sealing machines, bagging systems, and fully automatic packaging machines. 

• Developing and overseeing distribution and dealer partners worldwide. Promoting a variety of machine lines and handling brand management in relevant regions
• Establishing sales and service offices and training local staff. Participating in exhibitions and trade shows for B2B, matchmaking and brand awareness 
• Managing various accounts and creating effective solutions to assist clients solve packaging issues in their production process and IT infrastructure

➡ Standard or bespoke machines
✅ Software engineering
➡ Installation and implementation 
✅ Calibration and validation services  
➡ Technical support 
✅ Trainings and workshops  

⭐ SAP NetWeaver, SAP ERP, MS Dynamics CRM, MS Office, MS Cloud, Mailchimp, WordPress, Umbraco, CMS, Adobe Premiere Rush, iMovie, Mainchain
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
SoftGroup® SaTT (Serialization and Track & Trace) provides innovative all-in-one solutions for mass serialization and centralized management of packaging lines in the pharmaceutical industry. They allow full traceability of any single or aggregate packaging unit within the supply chain.

• Commercial and technical experience in sales (direct sales, pre-sales, post-sales and channel sales), export, consulting and marketing. Maintained strong relationship with clients and partners, across organizations, teams and projects. Regular internal technical specification trainings for software and hardware products 
• Identified and qualified new opportunities through research and analysis. Transitioned “cold” inquires over time into “warm” responsive prospects. Developed international markets using full professional proficiency in English and German language 
• Worked on the intersection of IT, hardware machinery and pharmaceutical sectors. Demonstrated use of social media tools to expand and nurture contacts. Conducted weekly reporting’s and used sales automation tools. Prepared presentations, offers and related documentation for companies and customers  

SoftGroup® portfolio includes:
• Level 1 – Hardware: Serialization machines, Tamper Evident machines, Aggregation machines
• Level 2 – Line Controlling Software: controls the entire packaging line and its modules
• Level 3 – Site Controlling Software: controls all packaging lines and their modules
• Level 4 – Communication with CMOs and 3PLs
• Level 5 – Connection to EU Hub: secure data transfer to EMVO
profile_positions.title: Business Development Professional

profile_positions.description:
Events organized by Sofia Puppy Parade aim to improve the pet culture, introduce key elements of social innovation, and make our community a more happier and better place. The idea is to gather in the park, the puppies get a chance to mingle for a bit, the crowd forms a parade path close to the gathering place and the puppies parade their way through the path. There are no instructions for the puppy's style. The dogs can fly through in extravagant costumes or even pass through resting in their owner's lap. After the parade attendees get a chance to hang out with the puppies for a bit longer. There are a lot of games, gifts and prizes for all the participants. 

• Lead a team of +30 associates 
• Experience in running events for up to 2 000 individuals
• Host all events & source high quality entertainers
• Give interviews to national TV & online media 
• Work closely with exhibiting companies, stand designers & contractors
• Develop, implement & manage events
• Procurement of audio, security & rental needs
• Manage relationships with sponsors
• Prepare gift packs & promotional material
• Maintain a calendar of events for effective long-term planning & management
• Social media advertising via Facebook, Instagram & LinkedIn to publicise events 
• Supervise & coordinate activities of personnel & subcontractors
• In charge of schedules, day plans & registration procedures
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
Promote Bulgaria as an attractive business destination and attract investors due to the qualified low-cost workforce, lowest taxes in Europe (i.e. corporate income tax is 10%), strategical location which gives proximity to EMEA and CIS markets, and convenient operational expenses. Bulgaria is a member of the EU, ranked among the top 10 preferred outsourcing destinations for a premium-end product, and is an approved region for PL manufacturing. Bulgaria possesses the most affordable prices in Europe and offers quality service. The country is much closer to the market than Asian suppliers which avoid hassles with anti-dumping duties and cultural differences. Bulgaria is Europe's most reliable, capable and economical solution for high quality, and for fast delivery orders that need to arrive on time. 

• Business projects between Finland and Bulgaria, and vice-versa. Perform commercial activities, including import/export, outsourcing, subcontracting, consulting, intermediary, private
label manufacturing, parallel import, coordinate investors and other services in legal appliance to the law
• Operations covered from the following sectors - fast moving consuming goods, wine & beverages, agricultural commodities, textile/clothing & footwear, furniture & design, pulp & paper-based material, machine construction & metals, automobiles & bicycles, pharmaceuticals/chemical substances, construction projects, ICT services (software & hardware development), cleantech, tourism, translation & legalization, logistics & transport
• Responsibilities in leadership, collected market data & evaluated information from diverse resources; negotiated with potential business entities/networks/buyers, coordinated updates in numerous fields, i.e. price, place of origin, offered products and met relevant managers from grocery chains, hypermarkets, wholesalers and various corporations; attend exhibition/trade fairs & B2B/matchmaking events
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
• Sufficient experience in gastronomy and beverages, primarily specialized in importing, exporting, selling and marketing food and wine products. Introduced new products with clients that increased sales within a highly competitive retail market and streamlined a system of organization, ordering, daily production, and flow of service
• Successfully planned and organized numerous wine and food tasting/tour events and requisition lists, and transformed customer relations to that of a valued business partner. Advertised and promoted by using a variety of social media channels
• Evaluated and engaged suppliers to acquire goods and services for progress, efficiency and cost reduction. Analytical and problem solving skills, executed HoReCa/retail programs, promotions and trade policies
profile_positions.title: Business Development Specialist

profile_positions.description:
DigiMark is a software development company, which main purpose is helping businesses go digital. We provide each of our clients with a tailor-made software solution, designed to fit their specific business goals and demands.

• Significant experience in IT, primarily specialized in selling and marketing digital systems and software services. Worked closely together with our team of developers, sourced and procured a number of projects for creating websites and mobile applications, programming for iOS and Android, to AR/VR and game development
• Updated CVs of developers, engineers and project managers for current projects, accounts and partners. Worked on fixed bid and time-and-material offers, SoWs, NDAs, contracts and business case studies. Concentrated on international customers and start-ups from industries like healthcare, telecommunication, banking, finance, retail, insurance, logistics and education
• Developed and promoted the brand of the company. Participated in the sales, marketing, export and PR activities, and attracted new clients to patronize the organization. Generated new sales leads and gathered contacts and databases for the enterprise

Platforms: 
Apple iOS, Google Android, RIM Blackberry, Windows Phone, Bada, Symbian OS, Unity 3D

Development:
Objective C / Swift, C++ / C#, JAVA / J2ME, ASP / .NET, HTML5 / CSS3, Adobe Air / Flash, ReactJS / AngularJS
